alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, north central Baker, western Camden, northwestern Glynn, southeastern Pierce, Brantley, southeastern Ware, southern Wayne and Charlton Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickox, or 9 miles south of Nahunta, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Nahunta, Homeland, Screven, Hickox, Kings Ferry, Thalmann and St. George. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton
